content: TE-S SC Scaling chisels Ultra-robust TE-S scaling chisels for scraping away weld spatter, formwork seepage and other residues ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Upgraded breaking power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the chisel Better reliability – these chisel bits are made from high-alloy steel, essential when you need consistency and reliability Certified quality – developed using ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Built for tough jobs – tested for extreme use, our chisels are made to power through your most demanding demolition work Reduce maintenance – dust cap helps to avoid downtime and improve tool lifespan Applications Removing weld spatter, scale and concrete formwork overflow or seepage For use with TE-S electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-S Application: Scaling, Channeling Length: 14.2 in Technical Data | Connection end | TE-S | Application | Scaling, Channeling | Product Class | Standard ### ITEMS- 2430331 - Scaling chisel TE-S SC 36/8 - Package Size 1 pc - 2452298 - Scaling chisel TE-S SC 36/8 MP3 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 3x Scaling chisel TE-S SC 36/8
